reasoning: Hypotrichosis simplex of scalp is a rare isolated hair growth disorder with predominant scalp involvement. Heterogeneous condition with multiple genetic subtypes (HSS1-5). Global incidence estimated ~0.5-1 per 100k births based on clinical case series, but true epidemiology poorly characterized.
source: Zlotogorski A et al. (2006). Hypotrichosis simplex of the scalp is associated with haploinsufficiency of CDSN. Nat Genet. 38(7):794-800
